job_history.work_description: Employed a broad range of techniques and teaching strategies to retain student interest, differentiate instruction, and maximize individual learning by gaining immediate feedback through data analysis with use of instructional management systems and best practices.

Employed a broad range of techniques and teaching strategies to retain student interest, differentiate instruction, and maximize individual learning by gaining immediate feedback through data analysis with use of instructional management systems and best practices.

Developed individualized behavioral and developmental plans for children with Autism Spectrum Disorders; Developed behavior modification plans for staff, teachers, parents, and children. Supervised clinical team members with implementation of strategies for behavioral interventions. Managed staff during home and school therapy sessions. Provided professional development supervision for support staff. Coordinated and collaborated with Psychologists, school officials, insurance providers, occupational and speech therapists.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in teaching English Language Arts and Social Studies, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Instructional Design
skills.explanation: Employed a broad range of techniques and teaching strategies to retain student interest, differentiate instruction, and maximize individual learning, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Gained immediate feedback through data analysis with use of instructional management systems and best practices, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised clinical team members with implementation of strategies for behavioral interventions, managed staff during home and school therapy sessions, and provided professional development supervision for support staff, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Behavioral Intervention
skills.explanation: Developed individualized behavioral and developmental plans for children with Autism Spectrum Disorders, and developed behavior modification plans for staff, teachers, parents, and children, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated and collaborated with Psychologists, school officials, insurance providers, occupational and speech therapists, showing a solid working proficiency.
